job_details.experience_required: Minimum 3 years of experience leading and managing IT-related projects, 5-7 years of experience in application systems using SDLC methodology

jd: Hello, My name is Arun Kushwaha and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Title: Project Manager/Business Analyst ( Health Insurance )Location: 3545 Lakeland Dr, Jackson, Mississippi, 39232-8839, United States ( Onsite )Duration: 6-9 month contract to hireVisa : Any ( No H1, CPT, OPT )Must have LinkedIn and 2 Manager ReferencesJob Description:Seeking a skilled Project Manager/Business Analyst with health insurance experience. This role involves working onsite five days a week from day one, ensuring seamless project execution and stakeholder communication. The successful candidate will gather and document requirements, manage project tasks, allocate resources, and coordinate with stakeholders and IT teams.Top Skills Required:Business Analysis:Gathering and documenting requirementsCommunicating between stakeholders and ITProject Task Management for Java Application ProjectsResource AllocationSecondary Skills - Nice to Haves:PMP CertificationProject ManagementKnowledge of PMI methodologiesManaging timelines and budgetsProficiency in MS ProjectResponsibilities:Gather and document requirements from business stakeholdersCommunicate effectively between stakeholders and ITManage project tasks and timelines for Java application projectsAllocate resources efficientlyCoordinate with stakeholders and IT to deliver status updates to executivesTrain stakeholders on the Agile/Scrum frameworkFacilitate Scrum meetings and coordinate testing and release eventsWork closely with Applications management to align project plans with business objectivesTrack and report project status to managementFacilitate the implementation of Inter-Plan software releases with the Blue Cross and Blue Shield AssociationJob-Specific Requirements:Bachelor’s degreeMinimum 3 years of experience leading and managing IT-related projects5-7 years of experience in application systems using SDLC methodologyKnowledge of systems analysis and design, programming processes, and testingProficiency in Microsoft Project, Access, Word, Excel, Visio, and PowerPointStrong project leadership, interpersonal, communication, facilitation, and negotiation skillsExcellent group facilitation and teambuilding skills in technical and business troubleshootingPreferred experience in COBOL, JCL, CICS, MVS, DB2, and SDLC methodologyPMI Project Management Professional Certification is preferredSuccess Factors:Full ownership of the project management processOutgoing, positive personalityAbility to resolve conflicts, work in a team, problem-solve, and make decisions effectivelyDetail-oriented with strong business consulting skillsStrong motivational and leadership skills
